flavorText:
"Kinjalli sculpted humans from clay, but the dinosaurs were carved from unyielding stone."
—Itzama the Crested

foreignData.flavorText: „Kinjalli formte Menschen aus Lehm, doch die Dinosaurier meißelte er aus massivem Stein." —Itzama Knochenhaupt
foreignData.name: Tempel-Altisaurus
foreignData.text: Falls eine Quelle einem anderen Dinosaurier, den du kontrollierst, Schaden zufügen würde, verhindere alle bis auf 1 dieser Schadenspunkte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Kinjalli esculpió a los humanos del barro, pero los dinosaurios fueron tallados en roca sólida". —Itzama, la Crestada
foreignData.name: Altisaurio del templo
foreignData.text: Si una fuente fuera a hacerle daño a otro Dinosaurio que controlas, prevén todo ese daño excepto 1 punto.

foreignData.flavorText: « Kinjalli a modelé les humains dans la glaise, mais les dinosaures ont été sculptés dans la roche. » —Itzama la crêtée
foreignData.name: Altisaure du temple
foreignData.text: Si une source devait infliger des blessures à un autre dinosaure que vous contrôlez, prévenez toutes ces blessures sauf 1.

foreignData.flavorText: "Kinjalli plasmò gli umani dalla creta, ma scolpì i dinosauri da rocce granitiche." —Itzama dalla Cresta
foreignData.name: Altisauro del Tempio
foreignData.text: Se una fonte sta per infliggere danno a un altro Dinosauro che controlli, previeni tutto il danno tranne 1.

foreignData.flavorText: 「キンジャーリは土くれをこねて人間を作ったが、恐竜は屈強な岩から削り出したのだ。」 ――冠羽のイザマ
foreignData.name: 神殿アルティサウルス
foreignData.text: 発生源が、あなたがコントロールしている他の恐竜１体にダメージを与えるなら、そのダメージを１点を残してすべて軽減する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜

foreignData.flavorText: "킨잘리는 인간들은 진흙으로 만들었지만, 공룡들은 단단한 바위를 깎아 만들었다." —갈기투구 이차마
foreignData.name: 신전 알티사우루스
foreignData.text: 어느 원천이 당신이 조종하는 다른 공룡에게 피해를 입히려 하는 경우, 그 피해를 1점만 남기고 모두 방지한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Kinjalli esculpiu os humanos a partir do barro, mas os dinossauros foram talhados a partir da pedra inquebrantável." — Itzama da Crista
foreignData.name: Altissauro do Templo
foreignData.text: Se uma fonte causaria dano a outro Dinossauro que você controla, previna todo aquele dano, exceto 1 ponto.

foreignData.flavorText: «Кинхалли слепило людей из глины, динозавров же высекло из прочного камня». — Ицама Гребненосная
foreignData.name: Храмовый Альтизавр
foreignData.text: Если источник должен нанести повреждения другому Динозавру под вашим контролем, предотвратите все те повреждения, кроме 1.

foreignData.flavorText: 「津加理捏黏土为凡人，而雕顽石成恐龙。」 ～冠盔伊札玛
foreignData.name: 殿堂硕伟龙
foreignData.text: 如果某来源将对另一个由你操控的恐龙造成伤害，则防止其中除了1点以外的所有伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 「津加理捏黏土為凡人，而雕頑石成恐龍。」 ～冠盔伊札瑪
foreignData.name: 殿堂碩偉龍
foreignData.text: 如果某來源將對另一個由你操控的恐龍造成傷害，則防止其中除了1點以外的所有傷害。

name: Temple Altisaur
originalText: If a source would deal damage to another Dinosaur you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

rulings.text: The effects of two Temple Altisaurs won’t reduce the damage from one source below 1 damage.

Combat damage can be assigned to other Dinosaurs you control as normal, but most of that damage will be prevented. For example, if a 3/3 Dinosaur you control blocks a 5/5 creature with trample, the attacking player may assign 2 of that creature’s combat damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking and Temple Altisaur will prevent 2 of the 3 damage assigned to the defending Dinosaur.
If multiple sources would deal damage to another Dinosaur you control, all but 1 damage from each of those sources is prevented.

If multiple replacement and/or prevention effects could apply to a Dinosaur you control, you choose the order in which to apply those effects. For example, if another effect will prevent 1 damage that would be dealt to a Dinosaur, you may apply Temple Altisaur’s effect to prevent all but 1 of that damage and then apply the other effect to prevent that 1 damage.

text: If a source would deal damage to another Dinosaur you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.
